# Soda

DATA QUALITY

Soda is a data quality platform that enables data teams to detect, diagnose, and resolve data issues. It offers tools for monitoring, testing, and managing data quality, ensuring reliable data across the data pipeline. The platform supports integrations with various data sources and provides actionable insights to maintain data integrity.

## Soda + MotherDuck

Soda integrates with MotherDuck to ensure high data quality within the MotherDuck cloud data warehouse environment. By connecting to MotherDuck, Soda can monitor and test data stored in MotherDuck, allowing data teams to identify and address data quality issues promptly. This integration helps maintain accurate and reliable data for analytics and decision-making processes.
